summary: Implements a PyTorch module that computes the per‑voxel Structural Similarity (SSIM) index for pairs of 3‑D image volumes, applying a Gaussian smoothing window and optional padding to produce a similarity map with the same shape as the inputs.
business_intent: Enables quantitative assessment of visual similarity and quality of volumetric data (e.g., medical scans, scientific imaging) for model evaluation, loss calculation, or image registration tasks.
